section.p: After initializing the remote video view using , you can call this method to update its render and mirror modes. This method only affects the local user's view.

section.title: Scenario
section.p: This method applies to multi-channel scenarios.

plentry.pd:
Remote user's video display mode:
RENDER_MODE_HIDDEN (1): Hidden mode. Scales the video to fill the view while maintaining the aspect ratio. Some parts of the video might be cropped.
RENDER_MODE_FIT (2): Fit mode. Scales the video to fit one dimension of the view while maintaining the aspect ratio. Black bars appear in the remaining areas.
RENDER_MODE_ADAPTIVE (3): Adaptive mode (deprecated, not recommended).

Mirror mode of the remote user view:
VIDEO_MIRROR_MODE_AUTO (0): The SDK automatically decides whether to enable mirror mode. Mirror mode is enabled by default when using the front camera and disabled when using the rear camera.
VIDEO_MIRROR_MODE_ENABLED (1): Enables mirror mode for the local view.
VIDEO_MIRROR_MODE_DISABLED (2): Disables mirror mode for the local view.
